name: Extreme Weather Shelter
description:
I this game you are trying to survive all kinds of natural disasters by finding shelter in various biomes like mountains, woods and desert.

Controls: Arrow keys

Unfortunately I did not manage to implement most things I imagined, there is only wind and you can find shelter in the woods.

Team: me :^]

I was using the Fennel language and TIC-80 for the first time, which was a bit much. Feel free to improve the game if you feel like it, TIC-80 makes it easy.
